thread.section_title: Suite Oriani - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautiful place to stay
thread.title_full: Beautiful place to stay - Review of Suite Oriani, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: ugw2016
title: Beautiful place to stay
text: Excellent stay in newly renovated room with great bathroom. Beautiful house in a quiet elegant residential area. Train station with easy access to the city center in the vicinity. Nice restaurants only some minutes walk away. Good breakfeast is served in the room. Very friendly staff and Allessandro is a courteous and very helpful owner, who makes you feel at home from the very beginning.
